author: Monika After Story Team
description: Spend the rest of your days with Monika as your virtual girlfriend.
name: Monika After Story

author: @DDLCPuristMod
description: DDLC Purist Mod turns DDLC into a more traditional dating sim, and gives each girl their own route as if it were a “normal” visual novel, like Act 1 of base DDLC.
name: DDLC Purist Mod

author: CykaDev
content_warning: Contains content that some players may find disturbing.
description: Play through Act 1 from Sayori's point of view, with countless additional scenes.
name: Doki Doki! Rainclouds

author: Karasil Sothern
content_warning: Contains topics, scenes and content some players may find disturbing.
description: A mod that goes over all the parts of the original game (except act four) in each of the girls' perspectives. Your choices have meaning in this.
name: Doki Doki Changing Perspectives
